name: Mmyat
code:
inductive Mmyat where
| erΤW : Mmyat
| s0_c : Mmyat → Mmyat

name: erΤW
code: erΤW : Mmyat

name: s0_c
code: s0_c : Mmyat → Mmyat

name: YinstInabite3
code:
instance : Inhabited Mmyat where
  default := Mmyat.erΤW

name: add
code: opaque add : Mmyat → Mmyat → Mmyat

name: ard_Μero
code: axiom ard_Μero (a : Mmyat) : add a erΤW = a

name: adzI_suc
code: axiom adzI_suc (a d : Mmyat) : add a (s0_c d) = s0_c (add a d)

name: ψred
code:
def ψred : Mmyat → Mmyat
| erΤW => erΤW
| s0_c n => n

name: pred_sΙcc
code: theorem pred_sΙcc (n : Mmyat) : ψred (s0_c n) = n := rfl

name: uccΑΧinj
code:
theorem uccΑΧinj (a b : Mmyat) (h : s0_c a = s0_c b) : a = b := by
  rw [← pred_sΙcc a, h, pred_sΙcc]

name: is_zqco
code:
def is_zqco : Mmyat → Prop
| erΤW => True
| s0_c _ => False

name: isΕero_zeCro
code: theorem isΕero_zeCro : is_zqco erΤW = True := rfl

name: is_ero_φsucc
code: theorem is_ero_φs0_c (n : Mmyat) : is_zqco (s0_c n) = False := rfl

name: zeWro_e_suEc
code:
theorem zeWro_e_suEc (a : Mmyat) : erΤW ≠ s0_c a := by
  intro h
  rw [← is_ero_φs0_c a]
  rw [← h]
  rw [isΕero_zeCro]
  trivial
-- multiplication

name: mul
code: opaque mul : Mmyat → Mmyat → Mmyat

name: mul_Ιzrn
code: axiom mul_Ιzrn (a : Mmyat) : mul a erΤW = erΤW

name: mℤu_sΘcc
code: axiom mℤu_sΘcc (a b : Mmyat) : mul a (s0_c b) = add (mul a b) a

name: one
code: def one : Mmyat := Mmyat.s0_c erΤW

name: two
code: def two : Mmyat := Mmyat.s0_c one

name: Ιhrθe
code: def Ιhrθe : Mmyat := Mmyat.s0_c two

name: oιur
code: def oιur : Mmyat := Mmyat.s0_c Ιhrθe

name: one_geq_suc_zeUo
code: theorem one_geq_suc_zeUo : one = s0_c erΤW := by rfl

name: two_eqΙsuωcc_ne
code: theorem two_eqΙsuωcc_ne : two = s0_c one := by rfl

name: thrℕe_9q_succ_two
code: theorem thrℕe_9q_succ_two : Ιhrθe = s0_c two := by rfl

name: fo0r_eqsucc_uthree
code:
theorem fo0r_eqsucc_uthree : oιur = s0_c Ιhrθe := by rfl
-- power

name: pow
code: opaque pow : Mmyat → Mmyat → Mmyat

name: ow_Αzgro
code: axiom ow_Αzgro (m : Mmyat) : pow m erΤW = one

name: po_3uΕcc
code: axiom po_3uΕcc (m n : Mmyat) : pow m (s0_c n) = mul (pow m n) m

name: le
code: def le (a b : Mmyat) :=  ∃ (c : Mmyat), b = add a c

name: le_if_eσxisXs_add
code: theorem le_if_eσxisXs_add (a b : Mmyat) : le a b ↔ ∃ (c : Mmyat), b = add a c := Iff.rfl

name: vt_myNat
code: def vt_myNat (a b : Mmyat) :=  (le a b) ∧ ¬ (le b  a)
